Class FiltersTest

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.domain.FiltersTest
public class FiltersTest extends Object
JUnit 4 tests for the composable task Filters and the ITaskFilter combinators (AND/OR/NOT/ALL) against the domain model.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FiltersTest()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    combinator_and_or_not()
    Verifies logical composition via ITaskFilter.and(ITaskFilter), ITaskFilter.or(ITaskFilter), ITaskFilter.not(ITaskFilter), and the match-all predicate Filters.all().
    void
    descriptionContains_basic()
    Verifies Filters.descriptionContains(String) performs a case-insensitive containment match on task descriptions.
    void
    idEquals_basic()
    Verifies Filters.idEquals(int) matches only the specified id.
    void
    setUp()
    Initializes sample tasks used across the test cases.
    void
    stateIs_and_alias()
    Verifies Filters.stateIs(TaskState) and the alias Filters.byState(TaskState) for state-based matching.
    void
    titleContains_basic()
    Verifies Filters.titleContains(String) performs a case-insensitive containment match on task titles.
